title: Lounge Seating Area, Outdoor Kitchen, Large Closets, Playground
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1262 Sq.
With premium finishes and wide-open spaces, each floor plan from Aslan On The River brings you unparalleled luxury without sacrificing on comfort.
Our community offers a luxury swimming pool, fitness studio, sports courts, sports field and outdoor kitchens.
New Kitchen Appliance Package*, Designer Lighting*, Modern Paint Finishes, Large Closets, Two-Inch Blinds, Views, Private Patio/Balcony, Ceiling Fan, Microwave, Cable Ready
